TopicTitle: Is there a mod for keeping track of time while the computer is off?

Articles.Content: Hi! Me and a few friends are wanting to essentially create our own space program via KSP. Unlike a normal playthrough, we’re wanting to do our missions in real time. Is there some sort of mod to link game time to the system clock, that way, in the event of a blackout or power outage, missions can still go on in the background or skip ahead to the time elapsed while the computer was off?
